Package CIserver

Small Continuous Integration server for GitHub using webhooks

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ContinuousIntegrationServer
    Skeleton of a ContinuousIntegrationServer which acts as webhook See the Jetty documentation for API documentation of those classes.
    Execution
    The class Execution implements the functionality to execute the 'pull' and 'test' command and write it to a file
    Interface
    Used for creating a HTML document for the web interface so that you can traverse the log file system and display the contents of the log files.
    RequestParser
    The class RequestParser implementes to functionality to parse the JSON payload of a request and store the required field for the CI server
    Responder
    The class Responder implements the functionality to give a sufficient answer to the results of the test throughout commit statuses and mail notifications.

Package CIserver Description

Small Continuous Integration server for GitHub using webhooks
